long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to control brightness of chrome tabs. You can change brightness of each tab individually.

- Change brightness of current tab
- Toggle to maintain that brightness across different pages
- Save brightness of a page so you can come back later and the extension will remember the brightness that you prefer!
- Set global brightness, that will apply across all tabs and pages

Note: Certain pages (like chrome webstore) don't allow modifications, so this extension doesn't work on those pages
